DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at how a two-week use of a medication called Olanzapine might change appetite, physical activity, resting metabolic rate, body composition, and weight in healthy men.
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects of Olanzapine in Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteer Male Aged 1835 years Body Mass Index (BMI): <30 kg/m2 Presence of any medical disorder that may confound the assessment of relevant biological measures
